```{css echo=FALSE}
.embed-container {
    position: relative;
    padding-bottom: 129%;

}

.embed-container object,
.embed-container embed {
    position: absolute;

    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
```

```{=html}
<p class="text-center">
  <a class="btn btn-primary btn-lg blue-yellow-btn" href="`r rmarkdown::metadata$cv$pdf`" target="_blank">

  </a>
</p>
<div class="embed-container">
  <iframe src="`r rmarkdown::metadata$cv$pdf`#toolbar=0" style="border: 0.5px"></iframe>
```
